query.statement:
SELECT '' AS CHK ,'' AS FLAG ,A.MANDT ,A.PSPID ,CASE WHEN VBAK.VIPTP = 'X' THEN '[VIP]'||A.POST1 ELSE A.POST1 END POST1 ,A.POSID ,VALUE(M2.TEXT30,'') AS TEXT30 ,VALUE(M2.ZSPEC1,'') AS SPEC1 ,VALUE(M2.ZSPEC2,'') AS SPEC2 ,A.BLOCK ,A.BDTER ,EXTWG2 AS EXTWG ,'24' AS BOX_CK ,A.MATNR ,A.MATNR_NM ,A.ERFMG ,A.ERFME ,A.ENMNG ,A.JEAGO ,VALUE(M3.LIFNR,'') AS KUNNR -- 납품업체 ,VALUE(M3.LNAME,'') AS NAME1 -- 납품업체명 ,SUBSTR(A.GUBUN,2 ,10) AS EBELN -- 구매번호 ,SUBSTR(A.GUBUN,12) AS EBELP -- 구매품번 ,SUBSTR(A.RSNUM,1 ,10) AS RSNUM -- 예약번호 ,SUBSTR(A.RSNUM,11) AS RSPOS -- 예약품번 ,'' AS ZKNUM ,'' AS ZKNUM2 ,M1.KUNWE AS KUNWE -- 납품처 ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,2) = 'NC' THEN M1.LZONE ELSE KN.LZONE END AS ZLZONE -- 도착지 ,M2.TEMNO2 AS ZZTEMNO -- 설치팀 ,M2.NAMET2 AS ZZTEAMJ -- 설치팀명 ,TZ.VTEXT AS ZLZONE_NM -- 도착지명 , '' AS MATKL ,A.GUBN
FROM ( SELECT MANDT ,PSPID ,POST1 ,POSID ,EXTWG ,MATNR ,MAX(MATNR_NM) AS MATNR_NM ,MAX(EXTWG2) AS EXTWG2 ,SUM(ERFMG) AS ERFMG ,MAX(ERFME) AS ERFME ,MAX(ENMNG) AS ENMNG ,MAX(SU01) AS SU01 ,MAX(JEAGO) AS JEAGO ,MAX(BLOCK) AS BLOCK ,MAX(BDTER) AS BDTER ,MAX(EKGRP) AS EKGRP ,MAX(MATKL) AS MATKL ,MIN(RSNUM) AS RSNUM ,MAX(GUBUN) AS GUBUN ,MIN(GUBN) AS GUBN FROM ( SELECT PS.MANDT ,PS.POSID ,PJ.PSPID ,PJ.POST1 ,RE.MATNR ,RE.ERFMG ,RE.ERFME ,RE.ENMNG ,RE.ERFMG - RE.ENMNG AS SU01 ,RE.MATKL ,RE.RSNUM || RE.RSPOS AS RSNUM ,CASE WHEN MC.SBDKZ='2' THEN VALUE(( SELECT LABST FROM SAPHEE.MARD AS MD WHERE MD.MANDT = MC.MANDT AND MD.MATNR = MC.MATNR AND MD.WERKS = MC.WERKS AND MD.LGORT = RE.LGORT ),0.000) ELSE VALUE(( SELECT SUM(PRLAB) FROM SAPHEE.MSPR AS MD WHERE MD.MANDT = MC.MANDT AND MD.MATNR = MC.MATNR AND MD.WERKS = MC.WERKS AND MD.CHARG = '' AND MD.SOBKZ = 'Q' AND MD.PSPNR = HI.POSNR
),0.000) END AS JEAGO ,MA.EXTWG2 ,CASE WHEN MA.EXTWG='' THEN 'BOX33' ELSE MA.EXTWG END AS EXTWG ,MA.MATNR_NM ,CASE WHEN M6.BOXNO IS NULL THEN '기계실' ELSE SUBSTR(BLOCK,2) END AS BLOCK ,CASE CASE WHEN M6.BOXNO IS NULL THEN '1' ELSE SUBSTR(M6.BLOCK,1,1) END WHEN '1' THEN PS.ZZPRO01 WHEN '2' THEN CASE WHEN PS.ZZPRO02='00000000' THEN PS.ZZPRO01 ELSE PS.ZZPRO02 END WHEN '3' THEN CASE WHEN PS.ZZPRO03='00000000' THEN PS.ZZPRO01 ELSE PS.ZZPRO03 END WHEN '4' THEN CASE WHEN PS.ZZPRO04='00000000' THEN PS.ZZPRO01 ELSE PS.ZZPRO04 END WHEN '5' THEN CASE WHEN PS.ZZPRO05='00000000' THEN PS.ZZPRO01 ELSE PS.ZZPRO05 END WHEN '6' THEN CASE WHEN PS.ZZPRO06='00000000' THEN PS.ZZPRO01 ELSE PS.ZZPRO06 END ELSE PS.ZZPRO01 END AS BDTER ,MC.EKGRP ,VALUE(( SELECT EP.ELIKZ || EP.EBELN || EP.EBELP FROM SAPHEE.EKKN AS EK ,SAPHEE.EKPO AS EP WHERE EP.MANDT = EK.MANDT AND EP.EBELN = EK.EBELN AND EP.EBELP = EK.EBELP AND EP.MANDT = FK.MANDT AND EK.PS_PSP_PNR = FK.PSPEL AND EP.MATNR = RE.MATNR AND EP.LOEKZ = '' AND EP.ELIKZ = '' AND EP.EBELN = substr((select max(t013.ebeln||t013.ebelp) from saphee.zmmt013 as t013 where t013.mandt = fk.mandt and t013.posid = (select pps.posid from saphee.prps as pps where mandt = fk.mandt and pspnr = fk.pspel) and t013.matnr = MA.MATNR),1,10) AND EP.EBELP = substr((select max(t013.ebeln||t013.ebelp) from saphee.zmmt013 as t013 where t013.mandt = fk.mandt and t013.posid = (select pps.posid from saphee.prps as pps where mandt = fk.mandt and pspnr = fk.pspel) and t013.matnr = MA.MATNR),11,5)
FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ), ' ') AS GUBUN ,L3.GUBN AS GUBN FROM SAPHEE.PRPS AS PS INNER JOIN SAPHEE.PROJ AS PJ ON PJ.MANDT = PS.MANDT AND PJ.PSPID = SUBSTR(PS.POSID,1,6) INNER JOIN SAPHEE.PRHI AS HI ON HI.MANDT = PS.MANDT AND HI.UP = PS.PSPNR AND HI.PSPHI = PS.PSPHI INNER JOIN SAPHEE.AUFK AS FK ON FK.MANDT = HI.MANDT AND FK.PSPEL = HI.POSNR INNER JOIN SAPHEE.RESB AS RE ON RE.MANDT = FK.MANDT AND RE.AUFNR = FK.AUFNR INNER JOIN SAPHEE.MARA AS MA ON RE.MANDT = MA.MANDT AND RE.MATNR = MA.MATNR INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT026_1 AS M6 ON M6.MANDT = MA.MANDT AND M6.BOXNO = MA.EXTWG2 -- INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT026 AS M6 ON M6.MANDT = MA.MANDT -- AND M6.BOXNO = MA.EXTWG INNER JOIN SAPHEE.MARC AS MC ON MC.MANDT = MA.MANDT AND MC.MATNR = MA.MATNR AND MC.WERKS = '1000' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET017 AS L7 ON L7.MANDT = RE.MANDT AND L7.RSNUM = RE.RSNUM AND L7.RSPOS = RE.RSPOS AND L7.ZCANC = '' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET043 AS L3 ON L3.MANDT = PJ.MANDT AND L3.PSPID = PJ.PSPID WHERE PS.MANDT =#G_MANDT# -- 프로젝트 AND PS.POSID LIKE #PSPID#||'%' AND PS.STUFE = 2 AND RE.MANDT = #G_MANDT# -- 자재번호 AND RE.MATNR LIKE #MATNR#||'%' AND RE.BWART = '281' AND RE.WERKS = '1000' AND RE.KZEAR = '' AND RE.XLOEK = '' AND RE.XWAOK = 'X' AND RE.BAUGR = '' --AND MA.MANDT = #G_MANDT# --AND MA.MATNR LIKE '_%' -- BOX
AND MA.EXTWG2 IN ('BOX11','BOX14','BOX15','BOX17')
--AND L7.MANDT IS NULL AND VALUE(L7.MANDT,'') = '' ) AS A WHERE 1=1 AND GUBUN LIKE ' %' GROUP BY MANDT,PSPID,POST1,POSID,EXTWG,MATNR
) AS A
INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT013 AS M3 ON M3.MANDT = A.MANDT AND M3.EBELN = SUBSTR(A.GUBUN,2 ,10) AND M3.EBELP = SUBSTR(A.GUBUN,12)
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET007 AS L7 ON L7.MANDT = A.MANDT AND L7.POSID = A.POSID AND L7.MATNR = A.MATNR AND L7.ZCANC = '' INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS M2 ON M2.MANDT = A.MANDT AND M2.POSID = A.PSPID AND M2.POSID_1 = A.POSID INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS M1 ON M1.MANDT = A.MANDT AND M1.POSID = A.PSPID INNER JOIN SAPHEE.KNA1 AS KN ON KN.MANDT = M1.MANDT AND KN.KUNNR = M1.KUNWE INNER JOIN SAPHEE.TZONT AS TZ ON TZ.MANDT = KN.MANDT AND TZ.SPRAS = '3' AND TZ.LAND1 = 'KR' AND TZ.ZONE1 = KN.LZONE LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.VBAK AS VBAK ON A.MANDT = VBAK.MANDT AND A.PSPID = VBAK.ZZPJT_ID
WHERE 1=1 --AND L7.MANDT IS NULL AND VALUE(L7.MANDT,'') = '' -- 납품업체
AND M3.LIFNR = #LIFNR#
ORDER BY A.PSPID, A.EXTWG, A.MATNR FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
